Mr. VINDMAN. Mr. Speaker, I rise in strong opposition to the extreme  cuts to Medicaid and SNAP being pushed by extreme Washington  Republicans.

Last month, I spoke with Shannon, a mother whose son relies on  Medicaid for lifesaving care. I also spoke with Eugene, a fifth- generation farmer in Culpeper who grows produce that goes straight to  food…
